features.title: Why Choose Felicloud?
features.subtitle: Secure, private, and built for your freedom
features.militaryGradeDescription: Your files are protected with end-to-end encryption. Only you have access to your data.
features.euHostedDescription: All servers located in Europe. GDPR compliant and subject to strict European privacy laws.
features.allDevicesDescription: Access your files anywhere: mobile, desktop, web. Automatic sync across all platforms.
features.unlimitedSpeedDescription: No throttling, no bandwidth limits. Upload and download at maximum speed.
features.lifetimePlansDescription: Pay once, use forever. No recurring fees, no surprises.
features.openSourceDescription: Powered by Nextcloud. Transparent, auditable, and community-driven.

socialProof.testimonial2Quote: We switched from Google Drive to Felicloud for GDPR compliance. The migration was seamless and support was excellent.

pricing.pageSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. No hidden fees, ever.
pricing.freePlanDescription: Get 10 GB of secure, encrypted cloud storage with no credit card required. Perfect for trying out Felicloud.
pricing.freeApprovalNote: ‚ö†Ô∏è Free accounts are subject to approval and may take up to 24 hours to activate

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the free plan work?
faq.a1: Our free plan gives you 10 GB of secure cloud storage forever. There's no time limit, no credit card required. Perfect for trying out Felicloud risk-free.
faq.a2: Lifetime plans include one-time payment for permanent access to your storage. You'll never pay again! This includes all future updates, security patches, and feature additions.
faq.q3: Can I upgrade or downgrade later?
faq.a3: Yes! You can upgrade your plan at any time. If you're on a monthly or annual plan, you can switch between them. Contact our support team for assistance.
faq.a4: All our servers are located in European Union data centers. We're fully GDPR compliant and subject to strict European privacy laws.

meta.defaultDescription: Lifetime cloud storage plans with GDPR compliance. 10 GB free forever. 100% EU hosted servers.

upgrade.pageSubtitle: Get more storage space and unlock premium features. Choose the plan that fits your needs.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund, no questions asked.

faq.q1: Will I lose my data when upgrading?
faq.a1: No! Your data stays exactly where it is. The upgrade only increases your storage quota instantly.
faq.a2: Yes, but you'll need to contact support. We'll help you migrate to a smaller plan if needed.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and SEPA bank transfers via Stripe.

nativeApps.title: Native Apps
nativeApps.subtitle: Download our apps for the best experience on your device

infoBox.title: About the Apps
infoBox.description: The applications you'll download are called Nextcloud, the open-source platform that powers Felicloud. These apps are 100% compatible with our service and provide seamless access to your files.
infoBox.setupNote: First time setup? When you open the app, you'll be asked for a server URL. Don't worry, we've got you covered!

support.title: Need help?
support.description: Visit our support center for installation guides and system requirements

support.heroSubtitle: Get help with Felicloud. Browse our FAQ or contact our support team.
support.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about Felicloud

faq.q1: How do I get started with Felicloud?
faq.a1: Getting started is easy! Sign up for a free account, download our app for your device, and start uploading your files. Your free 10 GB account will be activated within 24 hours after approval.
faq.a2: Felicloud works on Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and any web browser. You can also connect via WebDAV for maximum compatibility with third-party apps.
faq.a3: All your files are protected with end-to-end encryption. Data is stored on servers located exclusively in Europe, complying with GDPR regulations. Only you have access to your encryption keys.
faq.q4: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a4: Yes! You can upgrade from a free account to any paid plan, or upgrade between storage tiers at any time. For lifetime plans, you'll only pay the difference when upgrading.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and SEPA bank transfers for European customers.
faq.a6: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of your purchase for a full refund, no questions asked.

support.contactSubtitle: Our support team is here to help you

tutorial.heroSubtitle: Connect Felicloud to any WebDAV-compatible application
tutorial.whatIsWebDAVDescription: WebDAV (Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning) is an extension of HTTP that allows you to connect Felicloud to virtually any application that supports file storage. This means you can access your files directly from file explorers, office applications, media players, and many other programs without using the Felicloud desktop app.
tutorial.noteText: Replace USERNAME with your actual Felicloud username (usually your email address).

windows.title: Windows
windows.step1: Open File Explorer and click on "This PC" in the left sidebar
windows.step2: Click on "Computer" tab in the ribbon, then "Map network drive"
windows.step4: Enter the WebDAV URL in the folder field
windows.step5: Check "Connect using different credentials" and click "Finish"
windows.step6: Enter your Felicloud email and password when prompted

macos.title: macOS
macos.step2: Press Command+K or Go ‚Üí Connect to Server from the menu
macos.step5: Choose "Registered User" and enter your credentials
macos.step6: Your Felicloud storage will appear in Finder

linux.title: Linux (GNOME/Nautilus)
linux.step2: Click "+ Other Locations" in the left sidebar
linux.step3: In "Connect to Server" at the bottom, enter the WebDAV URL starting with davs://
linux.step5: Enter your Felicloud credentials when prompted

mobile.title: Mobile (iOS & Android)
mobile.description: Use a WebDAV-compatible app from the App Store or Google Play:
mobile.iosApps: Documents by Readdle, FE File Explorer
mobile.androidApps: Total Commander, Solid Explorer, FX File Explorer
mobile.instructions: Then add a new WebDAV connection using the settings provided above.

office.title: Microsoft Office
office.description: Open and save documents directly to Felicloud from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint using File ‚Üí Open ‚Üí Add a Place ‚Üí WebDAV

libreoffice.title: LibreOffice
libreoffice.description: Access Felicloud via File ‚Üí Open Remote ‚Üí Add WebDAV connection with your credentials

cyberduck.title: Cyberduck / Transmit
cyberduck.description: Professional file transfer clients with full WebDAV support for advanced file management

media.title: Media Players
media.description: Stream media directly from Felicloud using VLC, Kodi, or other players with WebDAV support

connection.title: Connection refused or timeout
connection.description: Make sure you're using HTTPS (not HTTP) and that your firewall isn't blocking port 443. Try using davs:// instead of https:// on Linux.

auth.title: Authentication failed
auth.description: Double-check your email and password. If you have 2FA enabled, you may need to generate an app-specific password from your Felicloud account settings.

performance.title: Slow performance
performance.description: WebDAV performance depends on your internet connection. For best performance, use the native Felicloud app which includes local caching and optimized sync.

supportCTA.title: Still need help?
supportCTA.subtitle: Our support team is here to help you get connected

about.heroSubtitle: European cloud storage built on privacy, security, and transparency
about.storyParagraph1: Felicloud was founded with a simple mission: provide secure, private cloud storage that respects your rights and freedoms.
about.storyParagraph2: We believe that your data belongs to you, and only you. That's why we built Felicloud on the principles of privacy-by-design, transparency, and European values.
about.storyParagraph3: Unlike big tech companies that profit from your data, we have a simple business model: you pay for storage, and we provide the best service possible. No ads, no tracking, no hidden agendas.
about.organizationDescription: FELIDATA is dedicated to providing privacy-focused, European data solutions. As part of BTJT Group, we benefit from years of expertise in data management, security, and European compliance, ensuring that Felicloud meets the highest standards of quality and reliability.
about.privacyFirstDescription: Your data is encrypted end-to-end. We can't see your files, and we never will. GDPR compliant by design.
about.europeanDescription: All our servers are located in Europe, subject to strict European data protection laws. No US cloud act, no foreign surveillance.
about.openSourceDescription: Built on Nextcloud, an open-source platform. Transparent, auditable, and community-driven. No black boxes.
about.fairPricingDescription: Lifetime plans with no recurring fees. You own your storage forever. No price hikes, no subscription traps.
about.technologyParagraph1: Felicloud is powered by Nextcloud, the world's most popular self-hosted cloud platform. With over 400,000 deployments worldwide, Nextcloud is trusted by governments, universities, and enterprises.
about.technologyParagraph2: Our infrastructure is hosted in European data centers with ISO 27001 certification, redundant power and cooling, and 24/7 monitoring.
about.technologyParagraph3: We use industry-standard encryption (AES-256) and secure protocols (TLS 1.3) to protect your data in transit and at rest.
about.ctaSubtitle: Take back control of your data. Start with 10 GB free.
